title: ConfigSet delete/overwrite
description: As a follow up to SOLR-6736, we need a way for a user to overwrite an existing configset and/or delete an existing configset.

comments.content:
Can we leverage and/or consolidate code in ZkMaintenanceUtils for any of this? 
bin/solr zk rm -r /configs/myconfig
deletes a configset recursively, but don't quite know the mechanics of making this march with this work.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
